backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Microsoft SilverFlow LLM API - v2 with full GUTT documentation context (same as Claude/Ollama)
original_prompt: Clear my Thursday afternoon. Update my RSVPs and help me reschedule my meetings to another time and show me as {status}.

gutts.name: Identify Thursday Afternoon Time Window
gutts.capability: Parse and determine the exact time range for 'Thursday afternoon' based on user’s calendar settings and locale
gutts.user_goal: Ensure the system understands which time slots need to be cleared
gutts.evidence: System interprets 'Thursday afternoon' as 12:00 PM–5:00 PM local time

gutts.name: Retrieve Thursday Afternoon Events
gutts.capability: Fetch all calendar events scheduled within the identified Thursday afternoon time range
gutts.user_goal: Get a complete list of meetings that need to be cleared
gutts.evidence: System queries calendar and lists 3 events between 1:00 PM and 4:30 PM

gutts.name: Cancel or Decline Thursday Events
gutts.capability: Update RSVPs for all identified events to indicate non-attendance (e.g., decline or cancel)
gutts.user_goal: Ensure user is no longer committed to Thursday afternoon meetings
gutts.evidence: System sends RSVP updates marking user as 'Declined' for all affected events

gutts.name: Propose Alternative Times for Affected Meetings
gutts.capability: Generate suitable alternative time slots for each rescheduled meeting based on user availability and constraints
gutts.user_goal: Find new times for meetings that were cleared from Thursday afternoon
gutts.evidence: System suggests Friday 10:00 AM for one meeting and Monday 2:00 PM for another

gutts.name: Reschedule Meetings to Proposed Times
gutts.capability: Update calendar events with new times and send updated invites to participants
gutts.user_goal: Ensure meetings are successfully moved to new time slots
gutts.evidence: System updates event start time and sends revised invitations

gutts.name: Update User Calendar Status for Thursday Afternoon
gutts.capability: Set user’s calendar availability status (e.g., Free, Busy, Out of Office) for the cleared time window
gutts.user_goal: Reflect the desired status in the calendar for Thursday afternoon
gutts.evidence: System marks Thursday afternoon as 'Free' in user’s calendar
